about_the_game:
Step into Astera, a steampunk-infused fantasy world. Play your way in this fast-paced Action RPG featuring dual class specialization, rogue-like dungeons, a vast open world to explore and co-operative multiplayer. Crafted with passion by a dedicated team of action RPG enthusiasts.

In the world of Astera, a forgotten cataclysm has left its mark. You play as an agent of the Eternal Watchers, a secretive organization dedicated to protecting the realm since the dawn of a new civilization. Arm yourself with powerful weapons and abilities as you defend Astera from forces that could forever change the planet as you know it.

Key Features

  • Fast Paced and Fluid Combat
Engage in visceral, fast-paced combat where every move counts. Master abilities designed for maximum satisfaction and tactical depth. Unleash devastating combos against relentless hordes of enemies. Experience a unique challenge with adaptive smarter enemies, not just tougher ones.



  • Dual Class Specialization
Unleash your fantasy by combining talents and abilities from two hero classes. You start with a primary hero class and will be able to pick a secondary hero class later, enabling powerful combinations. You can start as a steel-clad warrior and become a paladin by picking up a cleric class as a secondary specialization. Or specialize in blasting your enemies from afar by combining a ranger and a mage.



  • Endless Character Customization
Customize your hero with a vast array of unique items that unlock powerful synergies. Discover unique equipment in dungeons, enabling you to craft your ideal build without relying on luck.



  • Dungeons Featuring Rogue-like Gameplay
Dive into procedurally generated dungeons that offer a fresh rogue-like experience every time. Choose new powers as you progress, transforming your hero and playstyle with each run. Each dungeon crawl is a unique, engaging challenge.



  • Meaningful Cooperative Multiplayer
Team up with friends to tackle challenging content together. Use support abilities to aid your allies or shield them with defensive skills. Enjoy a fully accessible solo experience as well—multiplayer is optional, but the camaraderie is unparalleled.



  • Explore a Vast World
Embark on an adventure in a meticulously crafted open world, brimming with secrets and rewards for the curious explorer. Immerse into the rich lore and soak in the atmospheric beauty of Astera.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card with the latest drivers
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card with the latest drivers
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
